description: "Map focusing on the passages between the islands of maritime Southeast Asia. Many 18th century routes are labelled with the ship/captain’s name and date, and there are notes on some shoals and reefs recording names, details and incidents/shipwrecks."
title: "Chart of East Indian Islands exhibiting the several Passages between the Indian and Pacific Oceans : inscribed to the Commanders and Officers of the British Ships Navigating those Seas"
